item.description:
Well Another AirVenture year has come and gone. We had over 30 members from FPA attend this year.

Pictures and some stories will be on hand for todays meeting.

 

The committees, Scholarship and Safety will both be meeting immediatley afterwards. Please feel free to join in on those meetings and offer your suggestions to the respective chairs.

.... We'll pick up some discussions on our upcoming events as well..

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
